page.title: 16SHOPPING FACILITIES-BLEWBURY
page.content: THE FEW FACILITIES FOR SHOPPING IN BLEWBURY ARE QUITE ADEQUATE TO COVER THE BASIC REQUIREMENTS OF THE VILLAGERS.MANY,HOWEVER CHOOSE TO GO TO NEARBY TOWNS WHICH OFFER A WIDER AND CHEAPER VARIETY OF GOODS. THE GENERAL STORE IS A SELF-SERVICE SHOP ON THE VILLAGE GREEN,OFFERING A WIDE RANGE OF GROCERIES,INCLUDING BREAD VEGETABLES AND STAMPS. THE GARDEN CENTRE AND GREENGROCER USED TO BE AN OLD ORCHARD.IT WAS STARTED BY THE PRESENT OWNER ABOUT TWENTY YEARS AGO.IT IS OPEN FIVE AND A HALF DAYS A WEEK.ITS BUSIEST TIME IS ON FRIDAY AND SATURDAY.MANY VEGETABLES AND PLANTS SUCH AS RUNNER BEANS,CABBAGES,GREEN PEPPERS,WALLFLOWERS AND MANY SEEDLINGS ARE GROWN LOCALLY.OTHER VEGETABLES AND FRUITS COME FROM A WHOLESALE MARKET IN LONDON.THE SHOP ALSO SELLS SEEDS AND FERTILISERS AND OTHER GARDEN ITEMS.
